name: Vehicle
description: Provides acceleration, edge, position and speed of vehicles

incomingDataTypes.name: acceleration
incomingDataTypes.description: acceleration value of vehicles

incomingDataTypes.name: angle
incomingDataTypes.description: angle value of vehicles

incomingDataTypes.name: edge
incomingDataTypes.description: edge value of the vehicle

incomingDataTypes.name: lane
incomingDataTypes.description: lane value of vehicles

incomingDataTypes.name: position
incomingDataTypes.description: current position of the car

incomingDataTypes.name: positionEdge
incomingDataTypes.description: current position edge of the car

incomingDataTypes.name: slope
incomingDataTypes.description: current slope of the car

incomingDataTypes.name: speed
incomingDataTypes.description: current speed of the car

incomingDataTypes.name: emission
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides fuel emission by vehicles on the edge

incomingDataTypes.name: flow
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides flow data by vehicles on the edge

incomingDataTypes.name: occupancy
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides occupancy data by vehicles on the edge

incomingDataTypes.name: speed
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides speed data by vehicles on the edge

incomingDataTypes.name: vehicleIDs
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides IDs from the vehicles on the edge

incomingDataTypes.name: vehicles
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides vehicles data on the edge

incomingDataTypes.name: lastStepVehicleNumber
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides the vehilce number of the last step

incomingDataTypes.name: lastStepMeanSpeed
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides the mean speed of the last step

incomingDataTypes.name: lastStepVehicleIDs
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides the vehicle IDs in the last made step

incomingDataTypes.name: lastStepOccupancy
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides the occupancy of the last step

incomingDataTypes.name: lastStepMeanLength
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides the mean length of the last step

incomingDataTypes.name: timeSinceDetection
incomingDataTypes.description: Provides the time since detection

name: Results
description: A consumer topic for receiving simulation results in an archived file

name: Resource
description: A producer topic for sending resources to the simulator (mapfile, traffic input, etc.)
